meanings.definition: To increase the operating speed of a computer's central processing unit (CPU) beyond the manufacturer's recommended limits.
meanings.sent1: He overclocks his computer to make it run faster.
meanings.sent2: She always overclocks her CPU for better performance.
meanings.sent3: Overclocks his computer so much, it might start thinking for itself!
meanings.sent4: Her determination overclocks her progress like a turbo boost.
meanings.sent5: The idea of overclocks is like giving your computer a superpower.

meanings.definition: The act of increasing the speed of a computer's CPU beyond its normal limits.
meanings.sent1: The overclocks of his CPU made a noticeable difference in performance.
meanings.sent2: Overclocks can sometimes lead to overheating issues in computers.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the fastest overclocks is intense among tech enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: His overclocks of the CPU were like pushing a car to its top speed.
meanings.sent5: The overclocks of the CPU were like adding rocket fuel to a computer.
